
# Cardano Example Dapp

## **Subroutines Demo**

Script that will test and explore subroutines, similar to functions in structured programming.


## Try it online: 

-  Visit [HTML5 Dapp](https://gamechangerfinance.github.io/gamechanger.wallet/examples/Subroutines%20Demo.html)
-  Run [Standalone URL dapp connection](https://beta-wallet.gamechanger.finance/api/2/run/1-H4sIAAAAAAAAA-1UTY_TMBD9K1bOK5rYzjjtDcQNkBCFE-LgTZw2Ur5ku7CrVf87M066zUbZBYGEhBRFTWzPmzdvZtx5iHzlaxPtov3p1nYnX7XGsbem6aKbqDAut1Xvq64lQFgzf9Se_ajqmnnjPNNtwcxdX3fWMHeluGGuaqpaW-Y7Vp7anEgcq1rmvD3l_mRNwXrbHaxumqo9vMJw_r4nIUNM3FuDsPbLp_cftffGkoaj9_1us6m7XNfHzvmdiON4U6Dcje6rTaH7Hh1RT2f9a0dkj5LGnOwJeR7oszffjdX156oxjo7G8FUzOO8vMrQ9uDf378w9gWJ6Ne6AwA_GOX0wrCtZHJ1vomTRlJCJL5p4dEZbabsm2n2N4jt1y7mSsMVfDinnQnOeCpUCVxxKlZINDFl4zjlISJUAgbatioOtBPOCF2EySJTElcKzHHJcxYQCiXhBGEh4LHUqZCkNWRFPyBISkGRFpqf-HFWgN34RT9oJpQS-M7Rk5AfEvYUC1_mgHT1Q8yXHaRZjbgnuFbIM9ltQFIVnXD1aFN-qYmSbakAPqiNGKynywIBaUROxo0_wwHyvWNIoA4sYYg6dmGocFEhBUQgJBnczv5GbclVUcazUItcFISV1A5JUhZ5nc76hEnNts3oIRAiqNTcz7KRCMEaSoScXFqqI4qmEcjzPFupsoEC9lPR24BuyDN0U4YY9U7F_0NVHDSM_3Te8axf-2e3MFvItgYMOJxr10v8ne6a203xDLcITXysyu1Pb57o_V331Cz1JcUe-2bTav75TL7Mu5_SEVT3tbuj530VauEGTCDSJUMcf1Yj0JyIVCbb6N-_s5cF5vg7addCug3YdtOugXQftOmjXQbsO2nXQ_s-D9tv5fP4JhzyyYMcRAAA)

## Source code:

- dapp connection code: [GCScript](Subroutines%20Demo.gcscript)
- frontend + dapp connection code : [HTML5 dapp](Subroutines%20Demo.html)

Dapp code was autogenerated by [Playground IDE in GameChanger Wallet ](https://beta-wallet.gamechanger.finance/playground)

## GCScript code (dapp connection):
```json
{
  "title": "Subroutines Demo",
  "description": "Script that will test and explore subroutines, similar to functions in structured programming.",
  "type": "script",
  "returnURLPattern": "http://localhost:3000/demo/api/dapp",
  "exportAs": "subroutineDemo",
  "run": {
    "runSeveralTimes": {
      "type": "importAsScript",
      "argsByKey": {
        "0": {
          "msg": "Message of 0"
        },
        "1": {
          "msg": "Message of 1"
        },
        "2": {
          "msg": "Message of 2"
        }
      },
      "from": [
        "",
        "",
        ""
      ]
    }
  }
}
```

## Run standalone QR dapp connection: 

You can use [Playground IDE in GameChanger Wallet ](https://beta-wallet.gamechanger.finance/playground) in `QR URL Transport` mode to capture results

[![This GCScript/URL is too large! make it shorter uploading parts to GCFS. Unable to generate QR code](Subroutines%20Demo.png)](https://gamechangerfinance.github.io/gamechanger.wallet/examples/Subroutines%20Demo.png)
